content:
Laundry detergent pods are a convenient option, and Target often has deals on them.

I've checked Target's website and the Cartwheel app, and here's what I found:

* **Tide Pods:**
	+ Tide Pods (72-count) are on sale for $14.99 (reg. $19.99)
	+ There's a Cartwheel offer for 5% off Tide Pods (expires 3/12)
	+ Additionally, you can use a digital coupon for $1 off Tide Pods (expires 3/14)
* **Gain Flings:**
	+ Gain Flings (72-count) are on sale for $14.99 (reg. $19.99)
	+ There's a Cartwheel offer for 5% off Gain Flings (expires 3/12)
* **Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean:**
	+ Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Pods (72-count) are on sale for $14.99 (reg. $19.99)
	+ There's a Cartwheel offer for 5% off Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Pods (expires 3/12)

With these deals, you can try out laundry detergent pods and enjoy the convenience they offer.

Remember to check the prices and offers in the Cartwheel app or on Target's website before you head to the store, as they may vary depending on your location.

If you're new to using laundry detergent pods, you might want to consider a smaller pack to try them out before committing to a larger quantity.

With your $10 Fetch Rewards gift card, you can score an even better deal on your laundry detergent pods!

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
